subject: International Monetary Fund (I
body:
International Monetary Fund (IMF)
From Desk Of Mrs. Sandra Michael
Managing Director
International Monetary Fund (IMF)
700 19th Street P/N Cotonou Benin .
Attn, Beneficiary: ,
This is to inform you that the Transfer arrangement with Western Union Department Benin Republic did not progress due to western union Money Transfer cannot be able to send your payment because such large amount of money $2.8MILON can not been to transferred by Western Union Money Transfer without firm Requirement that is required by this department.
The western union method was not clear due to the (I.M.F & others
Authorities) did not granted the large amount you were trying to get through western union,
Because of the large amount I would like it to be transfer to your bank account in your country in amounts of $50,000.00. In each transfer until you get the total funds of USD$2.8Million in your name, it is possible to wire the money into your account and avoid difficulties with the Authorities.
Please, let me know if you like the suggestion, 
Honestly Note that $50.00. is the only cost you will pay to have the first $50,000.00.
Payment into your account, this $50.00. charges is for the beneficiary Form and IMF guarantee Certificate we will use to deposit your total money into your bank account.
Meanwhile, Email me now and let me know if you will to receive your funds direct youâ€™re your bank account and send this $50.00. Form and IMF fee to have the first $50,000.00. into your account immediate. I am very sure of what I said, and it is a promise.
Send The Needed $50.00. Us Dollars through Bitcoin or iTunes cards
Send it and get back to me with the payment I gave you full guarantee that you will get your $50,000 into your account within 48hours./ Try send this $50.00. Fee today or tomorrow and email me with the Cards
Thank You.
Regards Mrs. Sandra Michael
The IMF: Organization and Finances
From Desk Of Mrs. Sandra Michael
Managing Director

subject: Re: International Monetary Fund (I
body:
Hello Mrs. Sandra Michael,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the transfer of funds through the Monetary Fund IMF. I appreciate the information you have provided about the process.

Could you please clarify how the transfer will be initiated once the required fee is paid? Additionally, could you explain more about the Form and IMF guarantee that are mentioned in your message?

I look forward to hearing back from you with more details on how to proceed with this transfer.

Best wishes,
Betty
